hero.title: Manage your business with Cenety
hero.subtitle: Create quotes, invoices, manage customers, and use dynamic QR codes. Everything you need for your freelance or small business in one place.

features.title: Everything You Need for Your Business
features.subtitle: From customer management to invoicing – Cenety provides all the tools you need to run your business successfully.

customerManagement.title: CRM Light – Customer Management Made Easy
customerManagement.description: Manage all your customer contacts centrally. Store contact details, notes, and interaction history in one place. Perfect for freelancers and small teams who don't need complex CRM software.

quotesInvoices.title: Professional Quotes & Invoices
quotesInvoices.description: Create professional quotes and invoices in minutes with automatic PDF generation. Customize designs, add your logo, and send documents directly to your customers.

dynamicQRCodes.title: Dynamic QR Codes with Analytics
dynamicQRCodes.description: Create QR codes with stable links that you can edit anytime. Track scans in real-time and get detailed analytics on how your QR codes are being used.

secure.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
secure.description: Your data is safe with enterprise-grade encryption and the latest security standards. GDPR compliant and regularly audited.

fast.title: Lightning Fast & Reliable
fast.description: Built with cutting-edge technologies for optimal performance. Fast load times and 99.9% uptime guarantee for maximum productivity.

scalable.title: Grows With Your Business
scalable.description: From solo freelancers to small teams – Cenety scales with you. No infrastructure worries, no hidden costs.

benefits.title: Why Choose Cenety?
benefits.subtitle: Thousands of freelancers and small businesses trust Cenety to optimize their business processes.

saveTime.title: Save Up to 10 Hours Per Week
saveTime.description: Automate repetitive tasks and focus on what really matters – your business.

professional.title: Professional Appearance
professional.description: Create professional documents that reflect your brand. Impress customers with high-quality quotes and invoices.

affordable.title: Affordable Pricing
affordable.description: No hidden costs, no long-term contracts. Pay only for what you use with flexible pricing models.

support.title: Excellent Support
support.description: Our team is always available to help. Fast response times and helpful resources when you need them.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Discover feedback from our satisfied customers worldwide.

testimonial1.name: Sarah Miller
testimonial1.text: Cenety has completely changed the way I work. I now save hours on invoicing and can focus on my creative work.

testimonial2.name: Michael Smith
testimonial2.text: Customer management is so intuitive. We've significantly optimized our processes and now save valuable time.

testimonial3.name: Lisa Weber
testimonial3.text: Dynamic QR codes are a game-changer. I can update them anytime without printing new codes. Brilliant!

cta.title: Ready to Optimize Your Business?
cta.subtitle: Start free today. No credit card required.

seo.title: Cenety – Business Toolkit for Freelancers | CRM, Quotes, Invoices & QR Codes
seo.description: Professional business toolkit for freelancers and small businesses. Customer management, quotes, invoices, and dynamic QR codes in one platform. Start free today!
seo.keywords: business toolkit, freelancer software, CRM, create quotes, create invoices, QR code generator, customer management, PDF generation, business management, SaaS
